dkSTS:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

dkSTS:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
dkSTS:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

dkSTS:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
Select a card to bottle for

dkSTS:EldritchRuneRelic.NAME: Rune of Eldritch Armor
dkSTS:EldritchRuneRelic.FLAVOR: This soul mark gives you a case of ice
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain 5 #yWard.

dkSTS:AlacrityRuneRelic.NAME: Rune of Alacrity
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain 1 #yEvasion.

dkSTS:AncestorsDebt.NAME: Ancestor's Debt
dkSTS:AncestorsDebt.FLAVOR: Someone in your past made a deal with an unknown entity which continues to sap your lifeforce...
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you increase your Max HP, lose 5 Gold for each Hit Point gained. NL Whenever you add a card to your Deck, lose 5 gold if its Common, 10 gold if its Uncommon, and 15 gold if its Rare.

dkSTS:MarkOfEnervation.NAME: Mark of Enervation
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose [E] at the start of your turn.

dkSTS:MarkOfTheThorn.NAME: Mark of the Thorn.
dkSTS:MarkOfTheThorn.FLAVOR: A "gift" from a fey which serves as a painful reminder of your ancestor's past deeds.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive healing, receive only half the healing.

dkSTS:BlastHammerRelic.NAME: Blast Hammer
dkSTS:BlastHammerRelic.FLAVOR: A gift from the devil that led you here...
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies with #yChill take 40% more damage rather than 15%.

dkSTS:RimefrostPendantRelic.NAME: Rimefrost Pendant
dkSTS:RimefrostPendantRelic.FLAVOR: You had to sell this to pay the interest on your debt... now you have it back...
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies with #yChill deal 25% less damage rather than 15%.

dkSTS:RocEggRelic.NAME: Roc Egg
dkSTS:RocEggRelic.FLAVOR: This egg was lain by a beast of unimaginable size and untold elemental power... looks delicious.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have remaining #yWard at the end of combat, heal HP equal to your remaining #yWard.
